mapper.insert: insert into REVIEW_BOARD values ( (select nvl(max(REVIEW_NUM),0)+1 from REVIEW_BOARD), #{MEM_ID}, #{REVIEW_PASS}, #{REVIEW_SUBJECT}, #{REVIEW_CONTENT}, sysdate, 0, 0 )
mapper.select: select * from ( select d.*, rownum rnum from (select REVIEW_BOARD.*, nvl(cnt,0) cnt from REVIEW_BOARD left outer join (select REVIEW_NUM, count(*) cnt from REVIEW_COMMENT group by REVIEW_NUM) c on REVIEW_BOARD.REVIEW_NUM = c.REVIEW_NUM where rownum <= #{endrow}) d ) where rnum >= #{startrow} and rnum <= #{endrow} order by REVIEW_DATE desc
